content.rendered:
S570 – Powerful performaning skid steer loader for serious lifting

Power meets comfort!

With the new Bobcat loaders, there’s a difference you can see – and a difference you’ll experience on the job. They have a completely re-engineered cab that keeps you comfortable, with superior power and hydraulic performance that will help you do more, do it faster and better. Add to this simplified maintenance and serviceability; and a completely new engineering design coupled with improved durability that further increases up-time.

The S530, S570, S590 and T590 models feature vertical lift path boom arms particularly suited to lift and carry as well as material-handling applications. The new vertical lift path loaders offer an increased lift height compared to the previous generation of machines and, combined with an optimised lift arm design, provide operators with the ability to lift heavier loads higher, making it easier to clear high-sided truck boxes and hoppers, as well as placing pallets loaded with heavy materials.

excerpt.rendered:
• Higher performance
  • Best working conditions
  • Increased hydraulic power
